description: Discover the best hotels in Agra, India. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Central Agra Stay Minutes from Wonder of the World Taj Mahal
hotels.description: Holiday Inn Agra MG Road, an IHG Hotel, is a convenient city sanctuary only minutes from one of the eight wonders of the world. Situated within the Sanjay Place commercial district, the best shops and restaurants are close at hand. Take a refreshing dip in the pool, get energised at the fitness centre or discover the immense Taj Mahal - a marble mausoleum and UNESCO World Heritage Site famous as a testament to love - before returning for a smooth scotch at the lobby bar.

seo.title: Hotels in Agra - India Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Find the best hotels in Agra, India with exclusive deals. Book your perfect getaway with up to 60% off.
